Mashup.name: CategoryListMashup

FieldDefinition.description: Disables zooming in and out within the mashup
FieldDefinition.name: disableZoom

FieldDefinition.description: Open the mashup in full screen mode
FieldDefinition.name: fullScreenMode

FieldDefinition.description: The height of the mashup page
FieldDefinition.name: height

FieldDefinition.description: Use the height of the device display, or a custom height (in px)
FieldDefinition.name: heightType

FieldDefinition.description: The initial zoom scale when the mashup is loaded for the first time
FieldDefinition.name: initialScale

FieldDefinition.description: A title for the mashup shortcut on the iOS home screen
FieldDefinition.name: iosShortcutIconTitle

FieldDefinition.description: The style of the iOS status bar
FieldDefinition.name: iosStatusBarAppearance

FieldDefinition.description: The maximum scale that users can zoom out to
FieldDefinition.name: maximumScale

FieldDefinition.description: The minimum scale that users can zoom out to
FieldDefinition.name: minimumScale

FieldDefinition.description: The width of the mashup page
FieldDefinition.name: width

FieldDefinition.description: Use the width of the device display, or a custom width (in px)
FieldDefinition.name: widthType
